title: Statuta legenda in admissione studiosorum chirurgiæ ad praxin chirurgiæ, ad quorum observationem singuli tenentur
author: University of Cambridge.
notes: Marginal date to the left of the final paragraph: Ex. Decret. Academ. Jun. 1684.
In this edition the final line of text, which is in italics reads: "& hæc sancta Dei Evangelia".
With a headpiece made of printer's flowers.
Regulations of the University of Cambridge relating to medical students.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
